column5: Wake up to a beautiful sunrise with birds chirping in this tropical paradise. Go for a refreshing swim in the crystal blue pool or sit under the shady pallapas to enjoy a refreshing drink. Friendly atmosphere, walking distance to restaurants, shopping centers, grocery stores and night clubs. Great for families. There is a coin operated laundromat onsite. BBQ grilling is allowed away from the building. Entertainment is just steps away, this place is sure to make vacation memorable.
